trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per l'evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> changes.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento si verifica quando un aspetto visivo di un proprietario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to draw the panel, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> object in which to draw the panel, the panel identification number, state information about the panel, and the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> specifica il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto da utilizzare per disegnare il pannello di <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> oggetto in cui disegnare il pannello, il numero di identificazione del pannello, informazioni sullo stato relative al pannello e il pannello da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event to create custom-drawn panels in your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare i dati forniti da questa classe in un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento per creare i pannelli creati all'interno dell'applicazione <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> (classe), il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumerazione e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire l'esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un form.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il `InitializeStatusBarPanels` metodo nel costruttore del form o `Load` metodo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> da utilizzare per il disegno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> utilizzato per il rendering del testo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the client area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta l'area client dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero del pannello nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> values that represents state information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> che rappresentano le informazioni sullo stato relative all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> che rappresenta il pannello da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> class without specifying a background and foreground color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> senza specificare un colore di sfondo e di primo piano per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> da utilizzare per il disegno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> utilizzato per il rendering del testo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the client area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> che rappresenta l'area client dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero del pannello nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> values that represents state information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> che rappresentano le informazioni sullo stato relative all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> che rappresenta il pannello da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> values that represents the foreground color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore di primo piano del pannello da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> values that represents the background color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore di sfondo del pannello da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> class with a specified background and foreground color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> con il colore di sfondo e di primo piano specificati per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> proprietà consente di ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> che deve essere disegnato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this information within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare queste informazioni all'interno del gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controllo per eseguire attività di disegno sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> (classe), il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire l'esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un form.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il `InitializeStatusBarPanels` metodo nel costruttore del form o `Load` metodo.
